full_summary:
# Shared Services Canada - TBIPS - Tier 2 - Solutions Integration Services

## Request for Proposal

### Information
* Reference Number: PW-22-01009239
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: R000118393
* Publication Date: October 5, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

### Brief Description
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) to invite qualified Task-Based and Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) suppliers to submit proposals for Services Integration solutions. The services are required for SPC to deliver Solutions Integration Services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Eligibility
This RFP is only open to TBIPS EN578-170432 Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 2 for services in the NCR for the following categories:
* B.6 Business System Analyst Level 3
* I.7 Platform Analyst - Level 3
* I.11 Technology Architect Level 3
* I.11 Technology Architect Level 2

### Contract Scope
SSC intends to award three (3) contracts each for three (3) years plus two (2) option years. The scope includes the provision of Solutions Integration Services to meet the business needs of SSC. The estimated effort hours per resource per category are 220 days.

### Security Requirements
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Facility Security Clearance
* Minimum Resource Security Required: SECRET

### Existing Contractors
* TEKsystems
* Maplesoft
* Donna Cona
* Tundra Technical Solutions
* iPSS Inc.
* 2Keys Corporation
* Accenture Inc.
* ACOSYS Consulting Services Inc.
* PriceWaterhouseCoopers LLP
* IBM Canada Limited
* Cumulative Solutions

### How to Obtain the RFP Document
Interested suppliers can contact the Contracting Authority, Mark Milloy, to obtain a copy of the RFP document.

### Note
Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) methodology refreshes three (3) times per year. Suppliers can become "Qualified SA Holders" by contacting RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca.

### Contact Information
Mark Milloy, Contracting Authority
Email: [mark.milloy@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.milloy@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-462-941
